title: WTB: Jennings 1-hand. Looking to fill out a back run
author: Centauri

posts.post_title: WTB: Jennings 1-hand. Looking to fill out a back run
posts.post_content:
I am looking to pick up a few more backs of Jennings 1-hand. Not sure 
I am willing to spend for an exhaustive set, but would like at least get 10 or so.

Current needs:

Polar Bear
Sweet Cap (any)
American Beauty
Tolstoi

Not a high roller, so probably can't afford more than a 2-3 condition. Feel free to hit me up. If you do have some of the rarer backs (Broadleaf, Hindu,etc) you are welcome to open a discussion as well.
Maybe rougher than what you are looking for.

Dang. That is fine for what I am putting together, but I bought a Polar Bear off eBay yesterday. 

But thank you for the offer.

See:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=337407[/url]

Card presents nicer in hand; crease is actually not so prominent.

Pm me if interested; thanks.

Doug
